name: Dr. Ayesha Khan
title: Dean, SMC
message: PHH has set a new benchmark in compassionate healthcare. Their work is truly inspiring.

name: Prof. Imran Siddiqui
title: Director, NICVD
message: The dedication of these young volunteers is a ray of hope for countless patients.
